lead_paragraph: Police say a 14-year-old boy was driving a minivan involved in a drive-by shooting that killed four people and injured five others.
snippet: Police say a 14-year-old boy was driving a minivan involved in a drive-by shooting that killed four people and injured five others.

headline.main: Police Say Driver in Drive-By Is 14
headline.print_headline: Police Say 14-Year-Old Was Driver in 4 Shooting Deaths
